pageContext.claim: “And now guys like Jerry Nadler, who I fought for many years -- successfully, I might add -- back in New York, in Manhattan. He was a Manhattan congressman. I beat him all the time.”
pageContext.analysis: As a New York politician in the 1980s and then in Congress, Nadler successfully stymied Trump's plans for a massive development in Manhattan. Trump ended up significantly scaling back his ambitions.
